hed: Zoë Kravitz Completely Reinvents Plaid for Back-to-School
dek: From school girl to cool girl.

items.caption:
Musician, actress, and card carrying It Girl [Zoë Kravitz](http://www.teenvogue.com/tag/zoe-kravitz) was spotted running errands around New York City yesterday while listening to some "Mama Said" through her headphones (okay, we have no idea what was playing, but it’s a good guess, no?). Unlike the off-duty skinny jeans of us mere mortals, though, she managed to pull together an outfit worthy of the coolest, most exclusive after party, after party — drape-y, just-cropped-enough wide leg pants, stacked heel chelsea boots, an easy fit white tee — and still look laid-back enough for picking up eggs and deodorant. 

The formula behind this magic all-purpose combination boils down to the right blend of proportions, colors and textures, served with a healthy dose of devil-may-care attitude. You can check the first three things off ahead, where we’ve broken the ensemble down to five pieces you can buy online right now — but all that extra swagger? Totally on you. 

Read on to shop the full look!
Quintessential cool girl Zoë Kravitz proves her It factor again by running errands in a not-so-basic cropped trousers/chelsea boot pairing.

Opting for slouchy, just-above-the-ankles pair of pants over some sort of denim adds a striking element of surprise to your weekend-ready style.

__Zara__ striped jacquard trousers, $29.90. [zara.com](http://www.zara.com/us/en/woman/trousers/culottes/striped-jacquard-trousers-c733899p2918077.html).

Anchor all that flow-y material with a sturdy, chunky heel booties. A higher shaft works well for fall — more coverage against the crisp air!

__Topshop__ chelsea boots, $130. [us.topshop.com](http://us.topshop.com/en/tsus/product/shoes-70484/boots-70514/chelsea-boots-3106696/megan-chelsea-boots-4521657?bi=1&ps=20).

While, sure, most any white tee will work here, one with shorter sleeves adds a louche downtown edge. Tip: You can get the same rakish effect by rolling up a few extra inches of fabric at each arm. 

__H&M__ jersey top, $9.99. [hm.com](http://www.hm.com/us/product/45533?article=45533-A).

There is a time and place for sleek, minimalist bags, and this is not it. Play up the rough-and-tumble feel of the other pieces by picking a purse with lots of exposed hardware instead.

__Rebecca Minkoff__ moto satchel, $355. [nordstrom.com](http://shop.nordstrom.com/s/rebecca-minkoff-moto-satchel/4017587).

Turn your Spotify habit into an opportunity to accessorize by trading the standard iPhone earbuds for old school headphones with a gold-plated finish. 

__We Are Frends__ headphones, $199.95. [wearefrends.com](http://www.wearefrends.com/product/taylor-gold-black/).
items.credit: Photo: Courtesy of We Are Frends

seoTitle: Zoë Kravitz Completely Reinvents Plaid for Back-to-School
seoDescription: Zoë Kravitz reinvents the back-to-school staple wearing cropped plaid trousers and a white t-shirt.
